previewArticle.title: Italy vs. Costa Rica: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group D Preview

recapArticle.title: Italy 0, Costa Rica 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group D Match Recap

timelineItems.name: Kevin Geer
timelineItems.text: I love the National Anthems of each country and the gusto they are song with. #WorldCup #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: FitriHalim
timelineItems.text: Don't worry England fan. Andrea Pirlo will give a little of hope to you! #FWC2014 #ITAvCRC #italy #TheAzzuri #italian #legend #AndreaPirlo

timelineItems.name: Philip O'Connor
timelineItems.text: As it stands, players from AIK, Aalesund, Sarpissa & Rosenborg have more chance of making knockout stages than Wayne Rooney. #ITAvCRC #WC14

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: Okay CONCACAF fans, do we root for Costa Rica? Can we do that? #ITAvCRC #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: SilcosPunditry
timelineItems.text: #ITAvCRC kickoff big bad buffon is back, 3 lions need a azzzuri win but this is international football and anything could happen #brazilnuts

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Italy. Andrea Pirlo tries a through ball, but Claudio Marchisio is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Mina
timelineItems.text: There is really nothing that compares to the magnificence of Gigi Buffon singing the Italian national anthem. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrea Pirlo (Italy).
Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Jacob
timelineItems.text: Alright Costa Rica, you made CONCACAF look good once, let's do it again and knock of Italy. #ITAvCRC #ITACRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica).
Giorgio Chiellini (Italy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Christian Bolaños (Costa Rica).
Offside, Italy. Daniele De Rossi tries a through ball, but Ignazio Abate is caught offside.
Corner,  Costa Rica. Conceded by Claudio Marchisio.

timelineItems.name: Wyatt Cash
timelineItems.text: Cannot be said enough how good a side Costa Rica have looked. Even if results fall their way, ENG could have serious trouble. #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Antonio Fullone
timelineItems.text: For how much I love Italy .. But seriously .. Our soccer is boring as hell. #ITAvsCRC #italiacostarica

timelineItems.name: Andy Soh
timelineItems.text: Heh. This game has too many long balls and not enough build up. It's defense passing to the other team's defense. #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Fake Profile
timelineItems.text: #ITAvsCRC is basically England vs Extreme optimism. #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Costa Rica. Conceded by Giorgio Chiellini.

timelineItems.name: Läurënt
timelineItems.text: I'm going for a 1-1 draw #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Didi K.
timelineItems.text: “@MLSReserves: Okay CONCACAF fans, do we root for Costa Rica? Can we do that? #ITAvCRC #USMNT” YES! Costa Rica!!!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Christian Bolaños (Costa Rica) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Bryan Ruiz.

timelineItems.name: Phillip Bupp
timelineItems.text: Rooting for #CRC today for CONCACAF reasons. Love #ENG but they don't deserve to be in the knockout round. #ITAvCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Andy Soh
timelineItems.text: Referee got a decision wrong. Should have been an ITA goal kick not a CRC corner. #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Huan Vo
timelineItems.text: So far #CRC has proved to be an even matchup with #ITA. I'm impressed. #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Richard Poplak
timelineItems.text: This Costa Rica team. They make their opponents look ordinary. Which perhaps they are. #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Italy 0, Costa Rica 1.

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: well apparently Italy had fitness for 1.5 entire games in this world cup, shame that Balo won't get that kiss #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Asif Burhan
timelineItems.text: Through to the second round, Costa Rica have now won more matches in four tournaments than Scotland have in eight. #Brasil2014 #CRC #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Amos  Arteta Jumah
timelineItems.text: FT: Costa Rica 1-0 Italy. a well deserved win ! congrats #Campbell !! #Brazil2014 #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Mike Madden
timelineItems.text: Italy forgot to order up the Colorado-style blizzard for this one, though I guess those are hard to come by in Recife. #ITAvCRC #USA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #CRC hold on to defeat #ITA 1-0. http://t.co/g6pXS7clOt #ITAvCRC http://t.co/IVE7zlDJVs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #CRC hold on to defeat #ITA 1-0. http://t.co/g6pXS7clOt #ITAvCRC http://t.co/IVE7zlDJVs

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica is the 3rd current CONCACAF nation to win its 1st two games at a #WorldCup (2002 Mexico, 1930 U.S.).

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 1958 - #ENG have been eliminated at the opening group stage of a #WorldCup for the first time since 1958. Beaten.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Italy has lost to a current CONCACAF country at the #WorldCup for the first time ever in 8 meetings.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: England is eliminated in the #WorldCup group stage for the first time in 11 appearances since 1958.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #CRC take down #ITA, in pole position for 1st place in Group D: http://t.co/BjRRZZZqSC #ITAvCRC http://t.co/Y2BE6dozrW

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #CRC take down #ITA, in pole position for 1st place in Group D: http://t.co/BjRRZZZqSC #ITAvCRC http://t.co/Y2BE6dozrW

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 4 - Algeria are the first African team to score four goals in a single #WorldCup match. History. #ALG

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Algeria is the first African team to score four goals in a #WorldCup game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT-Portugal pregame now on ESPN. First meeting since a U.S. 3-2 win at the 2002 #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 100 - Olivier Giroud has scored #FRA's 100th goal at #WorldCup finals. Landmark.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage plan: NED-CHI: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN AUS-ESP: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN2 CRO-MEX: 3:30 ET, ESPN CMR-BRA: 3:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.desc:
Jesse Marsch and Jason Saghini go through the tactical mastery that helped Costa Rica to the top of Group D.

For more World Cup coverage: http://www.mlssoccer.com/WorldCup

Brazil Bound Giveaway rules:
http://www.mlssoccer.com/brazilboundgiveawayrules
timelineItems.title: Costa Rica's stong tactics prove too much for Italians at World Cup | Brazil Bound

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 1st - Karim Benzema is the first player to miss a penalty at the 2014 #WorldCup, with the previous seven being scored. Hot.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Karim Benzema is the first French player to miss a #WorldCup penalty. They'd converted all 10 previously.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: France up 3-0 on Switzerland, which had allowed a total of two goals in its previous eight #WorldCup games.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - #FRA have scored 3+ goals in consecutive World Cup games for the first time since the Group Stages of the 1998 #WorldCup. Romp.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: France has scored three first-half goals in a #WorldCup game for the fourth time, first since 1978.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT has conceded seven goals in the first five minutes of #WorldCup games, most by any team in WC history.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: France has scored five goals in a #WorldCup game for the third time, first since 1958.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 5 - Karim Benzema has played a hand in five of #FRA's eight goals so far in the 2014 #WorldCup (three goals, two assists). Inspiration.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - #NED have won three of the last four #WorldCup games in which they have gone behind. Warriors.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: ARG-IRN: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN GER-GHA: 2:30 ET, ESPN NGA-BIH, 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: David Villa extends his Spanish records with his 59th int'l goal and his 9th #WorldCup goal.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Varela's goal (90'+4:33) is the latest recorded #WorldCup goal in a regulation game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 77 goals thus far is the most through 26 #WorldCup games since 1982. A couple underlying numbers from cohort John Parolin...

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Average shot distance of 20.9 yards in 2014 is the closest of any #WorldCup in our data set (since 1966).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Rise in scoring could be luck, skill, bad defense or mere variance. Whatever the reason, it's been fun. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Honduras ended its #WorldCup scoring drought 7 minutes shy of Bolivia's record of 517, set from 1930 to 1994.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Enner Valencia is the first Ecuador player with two goals in a #WorldCup game.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Lionel Messi (90'+1) scores Argentina's latest-ever #WorldCup goal in regulation (excluding extra time).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Neymar puts Brazil up 1-0 with the 100th goal of this #WorldCup.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 4 - Neymar has now scored four times in three matches at the 2014 #WorldCup and eight times in his last six for #BRA. Leader.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Germany is 4-1-1 vs African teams at the #WorldCup, and all 7 of Germany's goals were scored in the 2nd half.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Miroslav Klose's 15 #WorldCup goals by location. Average distance: 8 yards. http://t.co/lMhHsJhCx3

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Miroslav Klose's 15 #WorldCup goals by location. Average distance: 8 yards. http://t.co/lMhHsJhCx3

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Asamoah Gyan puts Ghana up 2-1 on Germany. He's scored 5 of Ghana's 11 #WorldCup goals.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Asamoah Gyan puts Ghana up 2-1 on Germany. He's scored 5 of Ghana's 12 #WorldCup goals.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Miroslav Klose scores his 15th #WorldCup goal, tying the all-time record held (Brazilian) Ronaldo.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Miroslav Klose scores his 15th #WorldCup goal, tying the all-time record held by (Brazilian) Ronaldo.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - Miroslav Klose is the third player to net at four different #WorldCup finals (after Pele and Seeler). Longevity.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: And for fun, here are Ronaldo's 15 #WorldCup goals. Average distance: 13 yards. http://t.co/pL2acnIu6C

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: And for fun, here are Ronaldo's 15 #WorldCup goals. Average distance: 13 yards. http://t.co/pL2acnIu6C

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: BEL-RUS: 11:30 AM ET, ABC KOR-ALG: 2:30 ET, ABC #USMNT-POR: 5 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 15 - All-time #WorldCup top scorers, with Klose and Ronaldo joint-top. Graphic. #GER #BRA http://t.co/GdSLf51bC9

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 15 - All-time #WorldCup top scorers, with Klose and Ronaldo joint-top. Graphic. #GER #BRA http://t.co/GdSLf51bC9

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Nigeria ends a 9-game #WorldCup winless streak with its 1st WC win since 1998. Bosnia-Herzegovina is eliminated.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Belgium advances to the #WorldCup knockout round for the first time since 2002.

timelineItems.name: Ahmad Nabil
timelineItems.text: Italia need to be more faster and precise the miss passes will let to some bad results #WorldCup2014 #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: zaheer kaisar
timelineItems.text: That diaz dude deserves an emmy or something with that over acting #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Alex Nikitin
timelineItems.text: I think Chiellini would avoid that header if he could replay that. Ouch! #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Student Soccer Blog
timelineItems.text: The Italians passing is all over the place once they get it out of their back four #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Mark Long
timelineItems.text: @espn World Cup announcer just said "sometimes you have to stick your face in places you'd rather not." Story of my life. #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Luke Winstanley
timelineItems.text: Oh well, there's not many good excuses to support Italy. #ForzaAzzurri #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Dan Fox
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica have an all white kit so if Italy pretend their playing England they'll start to play! #ITAvsCRC #ITA #ENG #3Lions #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mario Balotelli (Italy).
Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Nicola Jade
timelineItems.text: Just walked in to find that Italy arent thrashing Costa Rica 3-0 like I hoped & sounds like theyre actually playing quite badly..#ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: neattii cat
timelineItems.text: Long pauses in the commentary. The visually impaired are not missing anything. #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Sunil Kadam
timelineItems.text: Apologies Italy, it appears the hopes of the English nation have weighed heavy on your form. #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Colombia papááá!!!
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica dominating this game, but they better be careful Super Mario doesn't get loose! #ITAvsCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Italy. Claudio Marchisio tries a through ball, but Mario Balotelli is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: footyindia
timelineItems.text: 23 min: Balotelli showing glimpses of his ability, #ENG hopes are in this man hands, how funny footbal is #ITAvsCRC #worldcup2014

timelineItems.name: Anthea Villanueva
timelineItems.text: Some excitement please. Not #ESPvsNED level excitement, but some. Keep cool, Super Mario. #ITAvsCRC #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Yeltsin Tejeda (Costa Rica).
Claudio Marchisio (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Thiago Motta (Italy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Andrea Pirlo (Italy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica).

timelineItems.name: Anthony McAllister
timelineItems.text: England's world cup survival is resting in Italy's hands... C'Mon Italy!! #England #Italy #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: How Cerci isnt starting for this side.. Idk. Doesnt quite fit system like others but 1 of the more exciting Azzurri players for me. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: FCB News&Negativity
timelineItems.text: That pitch looks as if it had been photoshopped on. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Que Sera Zafar
timelineItems.text: Watching Costa Rica keep #Pirlo quiet so far confirms that #Henderson is crap and that Roy #Hodgson is very limited tactically #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Dante
timelineItems.text: Right now, I don't think England can beat this Costa Rica side. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Italy) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Andrea Pirlo with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Adolf Verloc
timelineItems.text: If Italy beat Costa Rica and Uruguay I'LL give Balotelli a kiss! Not sure if that's as incentivising as the Queen #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Anfernee Damaja
timelineItems.text: Watching the #ITAvsCRC match from an England perspective is like an injured dog wondering if it's gonna be put down.

timelineItems.name: Saukkke
timelineItems.text: Oh Mario! lol! #ITAvsCRC #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Josh
timelineItems.text: A kiss from the Queen... Kiss my arse! #Balloteli #Miss #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: NG
timelineItems.text: Ok I'm really mad now! How did he miss that?! Like seriously Italy?! Seriously?!!! #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica).
Matteo Darmian (Italy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: TH_14
timelineItems.text: What a beautiful ball by #pirlo! #Balotelli should have done much better. #ITAvsCRC #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Mario Balotelli (Italy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Thiago Motta with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Harun Osmanovic
timelineItems.text: can we have a moratorium on foul faking & floping in football? or at least don't make the other team kick the ball out #worldcup #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.name: Soup of the Tay
timelineItems.text: Maybe third times a charm for balotelli... #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Italy. Andrea Pirlo tries a through ball, but Matteo Darmian is caught offside.

timelineItems.text: That beast Balotelli is going to kill someone today! #ITAvsCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Júnior Díaz (Costa Rica).
Daniele De Rossi (Italy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Thömäs
timelineItems.text: #ITAvCRC: Balotelli is a monster. Absolute beast. He should have 2 goals already. #ITA vs. #CRC

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: at least costa rica are offering absolutely nothing right now, should only be a matter of time before Italy break through #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Onoriode Okpoko
timelineItems.text: England have two coaches watching this game, #ITAvCRC Roy Hodgson and the one that'll take them to the airport. #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Antonio Candreva (Italy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Thiago Motta.

timelineItems.name: Josh Elliott
timelineItems.text: This has entered matter-of-time time for #ITA. #CRC, find that Balotelli fellow--and don't lose him.... #ITAvCRC #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Christian Bolaños (Costa Rica) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Michael Umaña.

timelineItems.name: Steve Mottershead
timelineItems.text: Rather Costa Rica win now so we don't have to go through the agony and embarrassment for a third time in 10 days! #ENG #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Matt Flood
timelineItems.text: Playing the offsides trap against Pirlo. Just a matter of time until that goes wrong #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Adam Martin
timelineItems.text: Pirlo showing Gerrard how it should have been done yesterday #ITAvCRC #ForzaItalia #Azzurri ������

timelineItems.name: Mourinho's Lad
timelineItems.text: End to end stuff here! Am luving the Costa Ricans now tbh. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Italy. Andrea Pirlo tries a through ball, but Mario Balotelli is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Michael Hofer
timelineItems.text: #Soccer plays are THE WORST cryers on the planet! They make #NBA players look like MMA Fighters! #QuitRollingOnTheGround #WorldCup #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #ITA + #CRC GKs coming up big to keep the game level: http://t.co/oMXHQG5YyX #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Celso Borges.

timelineItems.name: Eoin Clarke
timelineItems.text: Chilean Linesman should have gone to Specsavers. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Carlos
timelineItems.text: Hope #England players are watching #ItavCrc, they might learn how to pass to feet, tackle and score!

timelineItems.name: JL Pagano
timelineItems.text: Linesman on far side = Ramsey Snow/Bolton from Game of Thrones? #ITAvCRC #Brasil2014

timelineItems.name: Zolile Zungu
timelineItems.text: Pirlo exhibiting yet another master class in the art of passing. Exquisite, precise & lethal #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Lucas The Hammer
timelineItems.text: Is that a few errant offside calls? #ITAvCRC #ARreplacement

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Costa Rica. Conceded by Giorgio Chiellini.

timelineItems.name: Tim Sparling
timelineItems.text: Hope Ruiz keeps up that form for ITFC opener with Fulham ! #ITAvCRC #ITFCinBrazil

timelineItems.name: FCB News&Negativity
timelineItems.text: Hello, FIFA? Yes, I'd like a refund on the 45 minutes of excitement I was promised. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Oscar Duarte (Costa Rica) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Bryan Ruiz with a cross following a corner.
Attempt blocked. Mario Balotelli (Italy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: JL Pagano
timelineItems.text: Starting to wonder if Marchisio is still hallucinating... #ITAvCRC #Brasil2014

timelineItems.name: Darryl Dioso
timelineItems.text: Wow. Italy dodges a penalty bullet. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: I need to see the replay on that no call #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Rhydian Lewis
timelineItems.text: That was a dreadful call #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Matt
timelineItems.text: That's one of the worst decisions ever. Definite pen. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Jonny
timelineItems.text: Outside of the box that's a free kick, pen all day long #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Chandra Passe
timelineItems.text: Are you kidding me? That should have been a penalty! #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! #CRC lead 1-0! #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Josh Cooper
timelineItems.text: Karma strikes and #CRC scores! 1-0. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Nathan Caton
timelineItems.text: Justice for Costa Rica! #ITAvCRC #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Matt Flood
timelineItems.text: What a response.l!! Costa Rica with a beautiful goal #ITAvCRC #CONCACAF

timelineItems.name: Stephen Dunham
timelineItems.text: Another shocking refereeing decision, clearest penalty you will ever see! #ITAvCRC #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Drew Laird
timelineItems.text: What a header! Ruiz makes it 1-0 to Costa Rica! #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Ozan Kara
timelineItems.text: Excellent Game from Costa Rica! Well done! They deserved the goal! #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Marc Serber
timelineItems.text: Nevermind! #CRC take the lead and its no more than they deserve. Ruiz, who else? #ITAvCRC #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: Should be 2-0 for the Ticos at this point. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Pardeep Cattry
timelineItems.text: In the words of @ThierryHenry, "I do it myself." #CRC didn't need that penalty.1-0 to the Ticos! #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Andrea Barzagli (Italy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Bolaños (Costa Rica).

timelineItems.name: Nate Coombs
timelineItems.text: Ticos killin' it. And England. #ITAvCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Jenn Russi
timelineItems.text: Is the linesman/asst referee wearing a Costa Rica jersey under his uniform? I'm thinking yes. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Willy
timelineItems.text: To be honest, fair play to Costa Rica, nobody gave them a prayer. Relying on other teams is a mugs game. #WorldCup2014 #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 9 - #CRC have found the back in the net in all but one of their last 10 World Cup games. Potent.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Simpson
timelineItems.text: For #ITA, that's better than a red card and a penalty. But not by much. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: excellent play from Costa Rica. They made both a near post and far post run where Ruiz heads home the breakthrough off the crossbar #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Thiago Motta (Italy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Yeltsin Tejeda (Costa Rica).

timelineItems.name: Jeff in Orlando
timelineItems.text: Good they got that goal, because #CRC got ROYALLY SCREWED on that penalty non-call #ITAvCRC #wc2014

timelineItems.name: Stefano Giacomarra
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica deserve that lead. Costa Rica's back 5 have been frustrating Balotelli the whole half. #ITAvCRC

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica leads a #WorldCup game at halftime for the first time.

timelineItems.name: Legacy Soccer
timelineItems.text: #ruiz #header #ticos #ITAvCRC #ticosuave 1-0

timelineItems.name: Matt Oswin
timelineItems.text: Half time: Italy 0-1 Costa Rica #WorldCup #ITAvCRC
